title: Stand By Me
lyrics:
## Verse 1
[G] Made a meal and threw it [B] up on Sunday
[C] I've got a lot of things to [D] learn
[G] Said I would and I'll be [B] leaving one day
[C] Before my heart starts to [D] burn

## Pre-chorus 1
[C] So what's the matter with [D] you?
[G] Sing me something [Em] new
Don't you know the [A] cold and wind and rain don't know
They [C] only seem to come and go a-[D]way

## Verse 2
[G] Times are hard when things have [B] got no meaning
I've [C] found a key upon the [D] floor
[G] Maybe you and I will [B] not believe in
The [C] things we find behind the [D] door

## Pre-chorus 2
[C] So what's the matter with [D] you?
[G] Sing me something [Em] new
Don't you know the [A] cold and wind and rain don't know
They [C] only seem to come and go a-[D]way

## Chorus
[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
the way it's gonna [C] be [F] [D]

[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
the way it's gonna [C] be [F] [D]

[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
the way it's gonna [C] be [F] [D]

[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
Yeah, nobody knows [C] [D]
the way it's gonna be

## Bridge
[G] If you're leaving will you [B] take me with you?
I'm [C] tired of talking on my [D] phone
[G] There is one thing I can [B] never give you
My [C] heart will never be your [D] home

## Pre-chorus
[C] So what's the matter with [D] you?
[G] Sing me something [Em] new
Don't you know the [A] cold and wind and rain don't know
They [C] only seem to come and go a-[D]way

## Chorus
[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
the way it's gonna [C] be [F] [D]

[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
the way it's gonna [C] be [F] [D]

[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
the way it's gonna [C] be [F] [D]

[G] Stand by [D] me
Nobody [Am] knows
Yeah, nobody knows [C] [D]
the way it's gonna be

title: You Are My Sunshine
lyrics:
[C] You are my sunshine, my only sunshine
[C] You make me happy when [G] skies are [C] gray
[C] You'll never know dear, how [G] much I [C] love you
[G] Please don't take my [C] sunshine a[G] way

The other night dear, as I lay sleeping
I dreamed I held you in my arms
When I awoke dear, I was mistaken
So I hung my head and I cried

You are my sunshine, my only sunshine
You make me happy when skies are gray
You'll never know dear, how much I love you
Please don't take my sunshine away

title: Twinkle, Twinkle, Little Star
lyrics:
[C] Twinkle, twinkle, little star
[G] How I wonder what you are
[C] Up above the world so high
[G] Like a diamond in the sky
[C] Twinkle, twinkle, little star
[G] How I wonder what you are

title: Happy Birthday
lyrics:
[C] Happy birthday to you
[C] Happy birthday to you
[F] Happy birthday dear [C] friend
[G] Happy birthday to [C] you

title: Amazing Grace
lyrics:
[C] Amazing grace, how sweet the sound
[G] That saved a wretch like me
[C] I once was lost, but now am found
[G] Was blind, but now I [C] see

[F] T'was grace that taught my heart to fear
[C] And grace my fears relieved
[F] How precious did that grace appear
[C] The hour I first [G] believed
